channel.title: Adding a new bank booth (Done adding.) Now I need to make it open bank
channel.description: Can someone tell me what to add in my object clicks...?

item.title: Adding a new bank booth (Done adding.) Now I need to make it open bank
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You’ve already added your bank booth in global objects?

if so, go in objects.cfg, and put

object = 2213 xcoord ycoord 2 object = 2213 xcoord ycoord 1

Change the coords, and now it will open the bank.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a new bank booth (Done adding.) Now I need to make it open bank

item.title: Adding a new bank booth (Done adding.) Now I need to make it open bank
item.dc:creator: @Cloud2 Cloud2
item.description:
@Cloud2 wrote:

It’s actually quite simple you add your case. so it should look like this:

case ****: //bank booth

The **** is the id of the object you are changing. then you will add the actual bank so it will open.

Now you make the bank open

openUpBank();

And once you have finished the whole code should look something like this

case 3045: //bank booth { openUpBank(); } break;

This must be added into your cases on some servers you will get errors if it isn’t.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a new bank booth (Done adding.) Now I need to make it open bank
